name: Project Home (Raga Development)
description:
A story about two children that stumbled upon a horror experience because they were playing with something that shouldn't be disturbed.

Control:

  • W A S D = Player Movement
  • E = Interact/Accept
  • Q = Inventory
  • Space = Remove Interaction Box
  • Alt+F4 = Quit

Credit:

  • Rava Fawwaz Scoriyanto - Game Designer/Project Manager
  • Bertrand Nicholaus - 2D Artist
  • Bernardus Aleandro - 2D Artist
  • Gery Gobalindo - Composer
  • Yeremia Kenny Santoso - Sound Engineer
  • Michael Jonathan William Rongdi - Game Programmer
  • Nicholas Owen - Game Programmer
